channel.title: Whies on Tharun Poobalan
channel.description: Recent content in Whies on Tharun Poobalan

item.description:
I spent a significant amount of time thinking about this fucking annoying ass word in the context of my work & life. In this blog I want to share a few of my notes. Maybe you find something useful in my brain soup.

finding happiness

The most privileged answer & the one I am going to give you is to focus on all of these factors at the same time.
